participant_1.background:
I'm not a fan of Comic Con, but I do enjoy making organic cat food for my furry friend.
i am currently pregnant with my second child.
I want to show my music to the world!
I like a soft bed for my baby.
i have a missing pinky toe.

participant_2.background:
I have a family who supports my dreams of travel and photography.
i am a cashier at a grocery store.
I have amazing parents who support my every adventure.
i m in a jazz band and play the saxophone.
i m writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do in your spare time?
I like playing music in my jazz band and writing. How about you?
I like to make music too! I also like to travel and take photos.
That's awesome! I want to travel more in the future. I'm currently working as a cashier at a grocery store.
Oh cool! I just had a baby, so my free time is pretty limited at the moment.
Thank you! I'm also writing my first novel.
That's amazing! I'm sure it'll be great.
Thanks! It's been a lot of work, but it's been fun.
It sounds like you have a lot going on!
I do, but it's all good things.
Yeah, I'm really happy with my life right now.
